content: sally starfish really is a star each side is worked center-out the legs are worked outward and sides are joined together at the same time **finished measurements ** width 17 length 17 **gauge ** 10 single_crochet x 10 row = 4 with mc and larger hook save time check your gauge **materials ** premier® yarns minikins™ chenille 100% polyester 1 76oz/50g 54yds/50m mc 2174-10 raindrops on roses - 2 balls premier® yarns parfait® chunky 100% polyester 3 5oz/100g 131yds/1205m cc1 1150-04 lilac 1 ball cc1 1150-13 bright pink 1 ball **hooks & notions ** us size j-10 6 mm and h-8 5 mm or size needed to obtain gauge tapestry needle removable stitch markers polyester stuffing small amount of black & white
